overview: Geelee, a slum-dweller in Mumbai craves for a bath. In the place she lives, a good bath is the preserve of the rich in the privacy of their bathrooms; and the men at the public well. Geelee, who works as a domestic help, is forced to cherish every drop of water that she has to draw from the well every morning. Will her dream of a good bath ever come true?
title: Geelee
